thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Helen Mcsharry
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Helen Mcsharry

author: Helen Mcsharry
title: Helen Mcsharry
text: I purchased an expensive dress on line when it arrived there were numerous snags and threads pulled on the dress so I sent it back however I will say I emailed the store and received a reply with an apology so not a bad experience I was just unlucky with the dress I am still awaiting a refund
